org.intermine.bio.util

Class ClobAccessReverseComplement

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.intermine.objectstore.query.ClobAccess
      • org.intermine.bio.util.ClobAccessReverseComplement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.CharSequence, Lazy

    public class ClobAccessReverseComplement
extends ClobAccess
    Subclass of ClobAccess that reverses and complements the DNA sequence contained within it.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.intermine.objectstore.query.ClobAccess

        ClobAccess.ClobAccessSubclassFactory

      • drainToPrintStream

        public void drainToPrintStream(java.io.PrintStream out)
        Sends the entire contents of the Clob into the given PrintStream. This method should be used in preference to toString() in order to save memory with large Clobs.
        Overrides:
        drainToPrintStream in class ClobAccess
        Parameters:
        out - a PrintStream to write the Clob value to

      • getDbDescription

        Returns:
